alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cleveland and northwestern McClain Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Norman, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Oklahoma City, Norman, Moore, Newcastle, Noble, and Goldsby. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 102 and 118. Interstate 44 between mile markers 109 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
